A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A disjointed mess. A few interesting ideas which\, much like the characters\, are not allowed to develop or interact with one another and are ultimately frustrated. Moments that are laughable for the wrong reasons\, and others very rightly infuriating. Adam Driver's Kylo Wren a surprising bright side. Otherwise\, frequent repetitions of tired tropes\, editing that leaves you weaving between incompatible tones and half-baked secondary storylines\, and many many missed opportunities
